participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Eli often finds solace in his art. He tends to be shy and prefers the company of fictional worlds over real-life interactions.
participant_1.background: I draw during classes instead of taking notes. I don't have many friends. I have long hair for a boy. I wish I could live in a fantasy world.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, Maya enjoys spending time with her son and engaging in creative activities. She has a love for both the beach and storytelling.
participant_2.background: Going to the beach is my favorite past time. My son is a football player. I am an american citizen. I love pizza.

content.text: I love drawing. I love to draw people. I don't have many friends, so I draw them instead.
I love drawing too! I love to draw landscapes. I love going to the beach and drawing the ocean.
That's cool! I wish I could draw landscapes. I wish I could live in a fantasy world.
I love fantasy worlds too! I'm a big fan of Lord of the Rings. I love the idea of living in a world where magic exists.
I've never read Lord of the Rings, but I've heard good things about it. I'm more into anime.
I've never watched anime, but I've heard it's good. I'm more into fantasy novels.
Have you ever read Harry Potter?
I've read all of the Harry Potter books! They're my favorite books of all time.
Me too! I've read them all over and over again. I love the characters and the world of Harry Potter.
Me too! I wish I could go to Hogwarts.
Me too! I'd love to learn how to do magic.
We should go to the beach sometime and draw together.
That would be fun! I love the beach.
